articles.author: Molly Bohannon
articles.title: Tesla Stock Drops 8% As European Sales Fall, Elon Musk’s Net Worth Goes Down $15 Billion - Forbes
articles.description: Musk’s net worth fell almost 4% as of midday Tuesday, dropping to almost exactly $100 billion below his all-time high of $464 billion.
articles.content: Teslas share price fell more than 8% as of 1:20 p.m. EST on Tuesday after reportsthat sales for the company across Europe fell about 45% over the last monthdespite rival electric-vehicle companies se… [+3986 chars]

articles.title: Trump, Not Putin, Forces Europe to Get Serious About Defense - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: European nations rushing to spend more as America threatens to withdraw its protection

articles.author: Noah Keate
articles.title: UK hikes defense spending to 2.5 percent by cutting aid - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Prime Minister Keir Starmer confirmed defense spending will rise to 2.5 percent by 2027, funded by reduced spending on international aid.
articles.content:
The government's Strategic Defense Review, looking at the threats Britain faces, is due to report this spring, and was meant to set out how the government would reach 2.5 percent.
